docs.title: ISO21972 Information technology — Upper level ontology for smart city indicators
docs.text:
Archived import of iso21972.owl on 13-Jan-2021

Draft version of the ISO 21972 Ontology.

Includes a subset of the GCI Foundation ontology by:

Fox, M.S. (2015) “The Role of Ontologies in Publishing and Analyzing City Indicators”, Computers, Environment and Urban Systems, Vol. 54, pp. 266-279.

Includes a subset of the OM ontology by:

Rijgersberg, H., Wigham, M., and Top, J.L., (2011), “How Semantics can Improve Engineering Processes: A Case of Units of Measure and Quantities”, Advanced Engineering Informatics, Vol. 25, pp. 276-287.

and the GovStat ontology by:

Pattuelli, M.C., (2003), “The GovStat Ontology: Technical Report”. The GovStat Project, Integration Design Laboratory, School of Information and Library Science, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, http://ils.unc.edu/govstat/papers/govstatontology.doc.

This ontology consists of the following patterns:

The ontology also contains the following classes that are not assigned to any pattern:

  • Application_area (i72)
  • Binary_prefix (i72)
  • cardinal scale
  • Cardinality (i72)
  • Cardinality_scale (i72)
  • Cardinality_unit (i72)
  • City (i72)
  • compound unit
  • Difference Indicator (i72)
  • Dimension (i72)
  • Distinct_count (i72)
  • Feature (i72)
  • fixed point
  • fixed zero point
  • Indicator (i72)
  • interval scale
  • ISO21972 Thing (i72)
  • Mean (i72)
  • measure
  • measurement scale
  • Measurement_scale_category (i72)
  • Monetary_unit (i72)
  • nominal scale
  • Observation (i72)
  • Ordered_measurement_scale_category (i72)
  • ordinal scale
  • Parameter (i72)
  • phenomenon
  • point
  • Population (i72)
  • prefix
  • quantity
  • ratio scale
  • Ratio Indicator (i72)
  • Sample (i72)
  • Sample_cardinality (i72)
  • Sample_mean (i72)
  • Sample_standard_deviation (i72)
  • Sample_sum (i72)
  • SI prefix
  • Singular_unit (i72)
  • Standard_deviation (i72)
  • Statistic (i72)
  • Sum (i72)
  • Sum Indicator (i72)
  • System_of_units (i72)
  • unit division
  • unit exponentiation
  • unit multiple or submultiple
  • unit multiplication
  • unit of measure
  • Variable (i72)
  • Vectorial_or_tensorial_character (i72)

The formal definition of these patterns is available in OWL Syntax.

docs.title: Formalization for Cardinality
docs.text: Property Constraint cardinality_of exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf Parameter

docs.title: Formalization for Cardinality_scale
docs.text: Property Constraint subClassOf Ratio_scale zero_element has fixed_zero_cardinality

docs.title: Formalization for Cardinality_unit
docs.text: Property Constraint inverse unit_of_measure exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf Singular_unit

docs.title: Formalization for City
docs.text: Property Constraint subClassOf sch::City subClassOf ISO21972Thing

docs.title: Formalization for DifferenceIndicator
docs.text: Property Constraint subClassOf Indicator term_1 exactly 1 owl::Thing term_2 exactly 1 owl::Thing

docs.title: Formalization for Distinct_count
docs.text: Property Constraint distinct_count_of exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf Parameter

docs.title: Formalization for Feature
docs.text: Property Constraint subClassOf geo::Feature subClassOf ISO21972Thing

docs.title: Specializations of ISO21972Thing
docs.text: Class Description Application_area (i72) Binary_prefix (i72) cardinal scale Cardinality (i72) Cardinality_scale (i72) Cardinality_unit (i72) City (i72) compound unit Difference Indicator (i72) Dimension (i72) Distinct_count (i72) Feature (i72) fixed point fixed zero point Indicator (i72) Indicator (i72) interval scale Mean (i72) measure measurement scale Measurement_scale_category (i72) Monetary_unit (i72) Monetary_unit (i72) nominal scale Observation (i72) Ordered_measurement_scale_category (i72) ordinal scale Parameter (i72) Parameter (i72) phenomenon point Population (i72) prefix quantity ratio scale Ratio Indicator (i72) Sample (i72) Sample_cardinality (i72) Sample_mean (i72) Sample_standard_deviation (i72) Sample_sum (i72) SI prefix Singular_unit (i72) Standard_deviation (i72) Statistic (i72) Sum (i72) Sum Indicator (i72) System_of_units (i72) unit division unit exponentiation unit multiple or submultiple unit multiplication unit of measure Variable (i72) Vectorial_or_tensorial_character (i72)

docs.title: Specializations of Indicator
docs.text: Class Description Difference Indicator (i72) Ratio Indicator (i72) Sum Indicator (i72)

docs.title: Formalization for Indicator
docs.text: Property Constraint for_city exactly 1 owl::Thing for_time_interval exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf ISO21972Thing subClassOf Quantity

docs.title: Formalization for Mean
docs.text: Property Constraint disjointWith Standard_deviation mean_of exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf Parameter

docs.title: Formalization for Monetary_unit
docs.text: Property Constraint subClassOf ISO21972Thing subClassOf Singular_unit

docs.title: Formalization for Observation
docs.text: Property Constraint inverse is_characteristic_of exactly 1 owl::Thing member_of all Population subClassOf ISO21972Thing

docs.title: Used by classes
docs.text: Class Property Sample (i72) is_composed_of Variable (i72) is_characteristic_of

docs.title: Specializations of Parameter
docs.text: Class Description Cardinality (i72) Distinct_count (i72) Mean (i72) Standard_deviation (i72) Sum (i72)

docs.title: Formalization for Parameter
docs.text: Property Constraint parameter_of_var exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf ISO21972Thing subClassOf Quantity

docs.title: Used by classes
docs.text: Class Property Population (i72) is_described_by Statistic (i72) is_an_estimate_of

docs.title: Formalization for Population
docs.text: Property Constraint defined_by all owl::Thing definition exactly 1 owl::Thing for_time_interval all time::DateTimeInterval inverse member_of all owl::Thing is_described_by all Parameter subClassOf ISO21972Thing

docs.title: Formalization for RatioIndicator
docs.text: Property Constraint denominator exactly 1 owl::Thing numerator exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf Indicator unit_of_measure exactly 1 owl::Thing

docs.title: Formalization for Sample
docs.text: Property Constraint inverse member_of all Observation is_described_by all Statistic is_part_of exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf ISO21972Thing

docs.title: Formalization for Sample_mean
docs.text: Property Constraint disjointWith Sample_standard_deviation subClassOf Statistic

docs.title: Formalization for Standard_deviation
docs.text: Property Constraint std_of exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf Parameter

docs.title: Specializations of Statistic
docs.text: Class Description Sample_cardinality (i72) Sample_mean (i72) Sample_standard_deviation (i72) Sample_sum (i72)

docs.title: Formalization for Statistic
docs.text: Property Constraint is_an_estimate_of all Parameter subClassOf ISO21972Thing

docs.title: Formalization for Sum
docs.text: Property Constraint subClassOf Parameter sum_of exactly 1 owl::Thing

docs.title: Formalization for SumIndicator
docs.text: Property Constraint subClassOf Indicator term_1 exactly 1 owl::Thing term_2 exactly 1 owl::Thing

docs.title: Formalization for Variable
docs.text: Property Constraint has_Name max 1 owl::Thing is_characteristic_of all Observation subClassOf ISO21972Thing

docs.title: Specializations of cardinal scale
docs.text: Class Description Cardinality_scale (i72) interval scale ratio scale

docs.title: Formalization for cardinal scale
docs.text: Property Constraint element all Fixed_point subClassOf Measurement_scale

docs.title: Specializations of compound unit
docs.text: Class Description unit division unit exponentiation unit multiplication

docs.title: Formalization for fixed point
docs.text: Property Constraint definition all Fixed_point or Measure or Quantity subClassOf Point

docs.title: Formalization for fixed zero point
docs.text: Property Constraint numerical_value has 0 subClassOf Fixed_point

docs.title: Formalization for measure
docs.text: Property Constraint hasNumericalValue all xsd::string hasNumericalValue exactly 1 owl::Thing hasUnit all Unit_of_measure hasUnit exactly 1 owl::Thing numerical_value all xsd::string numerical_value exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf ISO21972Thing unit_of_measure all Unit_of_measure unit_of_measure exactly 1 owl::Thing

docs.title: Used by classes
docs.text: Class Property quantity hasValue quantity value

docs.title: Specializations of measurement scale
docs.text: Class Description cardinal scale Cardinality_scale (i72) interval scale nominal scale ordinal scale ratio scale

docs.title: Formalization for nominal scale
docs.text: Property Constraint element all Measurement_scale_category subClassOf Measurement_scale

docs.title: Formalization for ordinal scale
docs.text: Property Constraint element all Ordered_measurement_scale_category subClassOf Measurement_scale

docs.title: Specializations of point
docs.text: Class Description fixed point fixed zero point

docs.title: Specializations of quantity
docs.text: Class Description Cardinality (i72) Difference Indicator (i72) Distinct_count (i72) Indicator (i72) Mean (i72) Parameter (i72) Ratio Indicator (i72) Standard_deviation (i72) Sum (i72) Sum Indicator (i72)

docs.title: Formalization for quantity
docs.text: Property Constraint hasUnit all Unit_of_measure hasUnit exactly 1 owl::Thing hasValue all Measure hasValue exactly 1 owl::Thing subClassOf ISO21972Thing unit_of_measure all Unit_of_measure unit_of_measure exactly 1 owl::Thing value all Measure value exactly 1 owl::Thing

docs.title: unit multiple or submultiple
docs.text: Open interactive unit multiple or submultiple diagram

docs.title: Formalization for unit multiple or submultiple
docs.text: Property Constraint definition all Measure or Quantity or Unit_of_measure subClassOf Unit_of_measure

docs.title: Specializations of unit of measure
docs.text: Class Description compound unit unit division unit exponentiation unit multiple or submultiple unit multiplication

docs.title: Used by classes
docs.text: Class Property measure hasUnit measure unit_of_measure quantity hasUnit quantity unit_of_measure

docs.title: Other annotations
docs.text: Annotation Value om-1::alternative_label unit om-1::alternative_label unit of measurement
